name: Final Kick VR - Virtual Reality free soccer game for Google Cardboard
name_original: Final Kick VR - Virtual Reality free soccer game for Google Cardboard
description:
Enjoy the tense moments of the penalty shots as if you were playing in a Football final, competing against the best teams, making the most spectacular goals and saves and along with graphics that will make you feel as if you were actually in the match. Perfect your special shots, shoot with special effects, fool your opponent and make the most impressive saves and become the World Champion.

◉ THE MOST REALISTIC GRAPHICS
Simply amazing right from the first minute.

◉ SIMPLE AND INTUITIVE CONTROLS
Without complicated virtual controls. Playing could not be any simpler, but mastering the game is only within reach of champions of football.

◉ 20 LOCAL OFFLINE TOURNAMENTS
These are for you to play against 100 of the best teams of the moment without internet connection.

◉ FREE
You can enjoy the game completely free. The inApp options are completely optional. What are you waiting for? Try it. There are spectacular goals for you to make.
